a.desc: MafiaStory is intended as an expansion to the classic game of Mafia. The app itself functions as a standalone game, and does not require a physical copy of the game or any other purchases.

b.desc: MafiaStory is a social game which combines Strategy, Logic, and Deception, to deliver a unique experience between you and your friends! If you have not played Mafia before, make sure to review instructions on [How to play].

d.desc: Everyone must have the app installed.
